regen.new_specification: The system shall incorporate both budget and deadline in a comprehensive evaluation, determining if a job is to be accepted or rejected by evaluating both parameters in conjunction.

regen.absent_element: consideration of the budget parameter in evaluating acceptance
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall take into account the budget parameter when determining the possibility of accepting or rejecting a job.

regen.absent_element: budget consideration for job acceptance or rejection
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall evaluate whether the job budget falls within the acceptable range before determining job acceptance or rejection.

label: The scheduler shall evaluate the budget for the job.
absence: evaluation of budget for the job
